amendment.description: An amendment to add a new section at the end of the bill providing that none of the funds in the bill may be used to deny requests for the public release of documents or evidence obtained through or in the Western Energy Markets: Enron Investigation (Docket No. PA02-2), the California Refund case (Docket No. EL00-95), the Anomalous Bidding Investigation (Docket No. IN03-10), or the Physical Withholding Investigation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Eshoo amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
